task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 341°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full facade (base to roofline) of the main building ahead, so I should tilt up to include the roof/top for a height estimate.
With the camera pitched up, I should now pitch back down slightly to include the building’s base and the roofline together for a full-height estimate.
The building is already centered and I can judge roughly two main stories plus roof/parapet, so I can provide a height estimate now without moving.
